### Missing GitLab Version Report

#### Context

| Title/Description                | Value                     |
|----------------------------------|---------------------------|
| **Is missing**                   | :heavy_check_mark: or :x: |
| **Is desired**                   | :heavy_check_mark: or :x: |
| **Docker-Tag**                   | (e.g., `17.0.2-ce`)       |
| **Corresponding GitLab-Version** | (e.g., `17.0.2-ce.0`)     |
